page.title: 08Boothby Meadows School.
page.content: {Boothby Meadows}is a school for mentally and phisically handicapped children. It was opened in September 1981. The building was dedicated in July 1982 and{opened by Councillor {Frank Revell,}Chairman of the Education Committie. It was {built by {Walkerdines.}It was built for 40 children with{ages ranging from 2 to {19.}Special sessions are devoted to outside play equipment which includes scooters,tricycles and bicycles of varying sizes.Importance is placed on confidence,balance and control which is built through ropes, bars, slides and a variety of soft play equiptment. Football, unihoc and netball are played by the children to build up their muscles.{There is a splashpool {in the school}building. It is used to relax the childen and give them confidence in the water.
